title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: OpenAI lawyers question Meta’s role in Elon Musk’s $97B takeover bid
items.description: OpenAI says that Elon Musk met with Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg to discuss a $97 billion takeover bid of the ChatGPT-maker.

items.title: OpenAI announces New Delhi office as it expands footprint in India
items.description: OpenAI has started hiring in India as it looks to expand its presence in the fast-growing South Asian tech market.

items.title: Paramount Plus Coupon Codes and Deals: Up to 50% Off in August
items.description: Save on streaming with the latest Paramount+ promo codes and deals, including 50% off subscriptions, free trials, and more.

items.title: KitchenAid Promo Code: $150 Off in August 2025
items.description: Save on every purchase with top KitchenAid coupons from WIRED, including up to $150 off select countertop appliances.

items.title: Ecosia has offered to take ‘stewardship’ of Chrome. And it’s not a bad idea.
items.description: Berlin-based nonprofit search engine Ecosia has asked a U.S. judge to turn Chrome into a foundation it controls, funding billions in climate projects.

items.title: Take $15 Off ‘Tony Hawk’s Pro Skater 3+4’ Remasters Right Now
items.description: Darkslide your way to gaming nostalgia for just $35.

items.title: Kanye West Said Memecoins ‘Prey On Fans.’ Then He Apparently Launched One
items.description: A new cryptocurrency promoted by Kanye West’s X account soared in value—then crashed, inflicting losses on the majority of investors.

items.title: Anduril, Blue Origin to study how to transport cargo from orbit to Earth for the Pentagon
items.description: Blue Origin and Anduril notched small contracts that could revolutionize how the Pentagon transports cargo.

items.title: As India bans real-money games, Dream Sports, MPL start pulling the plug
items.description: Several Indian startups, including Dream Sports, MPL, and Zupee, are shutting down their real-money games after parliament passed a bill banning such ...

items.title: The 40 Best Movies on Hulu This Week (August 2025)
items.description: The Monkey, John Wick, and Take Shelter are just a few of the movies you need to watch on Hulu right now.
